column4: how do you install Oo 3 beta 2? should I uninstall Oo 2.4 first?
go to the website, there are deb binaries out, no, you don't have to uninstall OOo 2.4. just be sure to run the correct binary,
then which ones are the ones I need?
they provide debs on their site now
the size of the archive is about 1xx mb
look carefully, it's for beta, but now Oo has released beta2
is it safe to follow that guide?
its the same thing, you'll just have a different filename
hm, so maybe I should install all the debs
you just need the one that is for your architecture
just follow the guide, it's pretty self explanatory
